name: Uncourt
description: A foundational open-source language model, Uncourt, specialized in Indian law to democratize access to legal information. It serves as critical public infrastructure for future legal-tech innovation in India.

funding.goal: To cover the absolute essential operational costs to ensure the Uncourt project remains active and can be continuously improved. This lean budget prioritizes core technical needs.

breakdown.description: Covers essential costs for fine-tuning experiments and model updates on budget-friendly cloud GPU services.
Covers basic cloud storage for the dataset and bandwidth for hosting model weights for public download.
Covers essential costs like domain name renewals and core software licenses.
